description: This file initializes and renders the React application by mounting the App component into the DOM element with id 'root'. It sets up the root React DOM node and wraps the application in React.StrictMode for highlighting potential problems.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components into the specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the created root.
